text: Doctor Detroit is a 1983 American comedy movie directed by Michael Pressman and stars Dan Aykroyd, Howard Hesseman, Lynn Whitfield, Fran Drescher, Donna Dixon. It was the first Dan Aykroyd worked following the death of his friend John Belushi and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1983 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American independent movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Pressman Category:Movies set in Chicago
title: Doctor Detroit
